text: The 2016 FIBA U16 Women's European Championship was the 28th edition of the Women's European basketball championship for national under-16 teams. Spain won their 10th championship title by beating Germany in the final, 64–48. ==Participating teams== * (Runners-up, 2015 FIBA Europe Women's Under-16 Championship Division B) * * * * * * * * (Winners, 2015 FIBA Europe Women's Under-16 Championship Division B) * * * * * * (3rd place, 2015 FIBA Europe Women's Under-16 Championship Division B) * ==Preliminary round== In this round, the 16 teams are allocated in four groups of four teams each.
